targets.rawSql:
WITH selected_platform AS(
WITH all_hours AS(
  SELECT CAST(stunde AS STRING) as stunde FROM UNNEST(GENERATE_ARRAY(0,23)) AS stunde
),
existing_hours AS(
SELECT CAST(EXTRACT(HOUR from time) AS STRING) as stunde, COUNT(DISTINCT externalId) as anzahlPosts FROM ${PlattformAnzahlPosts}
WHERE EXTRACT(date from time) > "$Zeitraum" AND  profileId = $profileID
GROUP BY stunde
ORDER BY stunde ASC),
not_exisiting_hours AS(
   SELECT all_hours.stunde as stunde, 0 as anzahlPosts
  FROM all_hours
  LEFT JOIN existing_hours ON all_hours.stunde = existing_hours.stunde
  WHERE existing_hours.stunde IS NULL
)
SELECT * FROM existing_hours UNION ALL SELECT * FROM not_exisiting_hours
ORDER by CAST(stunde AS INT)),

selected_comparison_platform AS(
WITH all_hours AS(
  SELECT CAST(stunde AS STRING) as stunde, 0 as anzahlPosts FROM UNNEST(GENERATE_ARRAY(0,23)) AS stunde
),
existing_hours AS(
SELECT CAST(EXTRACT(HOUR from time) AS STRING) as stunde, COUNT(DISTINCT externalId) as anzahlPosts FROM ${VergleichsPlattformAnzahlPosts}
WHERE EXTRACT(date from time) > "$Zeitraum" AND profileId = $VergleichsprofileID
GROUP BY stunde
ORDER BY stunde ASC),
not_exisiting_hours AS(
   SELECT all_hours.stunde as stunde, 0 as anzahlPosts
  FROM all_hours
  LEFT JOIN existing_hours ON all_hours.stunde = existing_hours.stunde
  WHERE existing_hours.stunde IS NULL
)
SELECT * FROM existing_hours UNION ALL SELECT * FROM not_exisiting_hours
ORDER by CAST(stunde AS INT))

SELECT selected_platform.stunde, anzahlPosts,COALESCE(VergleichsAnzahlposts,0)  as VergleichsAnzahlPosts,
"${Vergleichsplattform}" as Vergleichsplatform, "${Plattform}" as platform FROM selected_platform
LEFT JOIN (SELECT stunde, anzahlPosts as VergleichsAnzahlPosts FROM selected_comparison_platform) AS selected_comparison_platform
ON selected_platform.stunde = selected_comparison_platform.stunde
ORDER BY CAST(stunde AS INT)

CREATE TEMP FUNCTION getDayByDate(datum DATE)
RETURNS STRING
DETERMINISTIC 
LANGUAGE js
AS r"""
var jsDatum = new Date(datum);
var day = jsDatum.getUTCDay();
var days = ['Sunday', 'Monday', 'Tuesday', 'Wednesday', 'Thursday', 'Friday', 'Saturday'];
return days[day];
""";

CREATE TEMP FUNCTION getDayAsNumber(tag STRING)
RETURNS INT64
DETERMINISTIC 
LANGUAGE js
AS r"""
var days = ['Monday', 'Tuesday', 'Wednesday', 'Thursday', 'Friday', 'Saturday', 'Sunday'];
return days.indexOf(tag)
""";

CREATE TEMP FUNCTION getDayInGerman(tag STRING)
RETURNS STRING
DETERMINISTIC 
LANGUAGE js
AS r"""
const dayMap = {
        'Sunday': 'Sonntag',
        'Monday': 'Montag',
        'Tuesday': 'Dienstag',
        'Wednesday': 'Mittwoch',
        'Thursday': 'Donnerstag',
        'Friday': 'Freitag',
        'Saturday': 'Samstag'};
return dayMap[tag]
""";

WITH selected_platform AS(
WITH all_days AS(
  SELECT tag FROM UNNEST(['Sunday', 'Monday', 'Tuesday', 'Wednesday', 'Thursday', 'Friday', 'Saturday']) AS tag
),
existing_days AS(
SELECT getDayByDate(EXTRACT(DATE from time)) as tag, COUNT(DISTINCT externalId) as anzahlPosts FROM ${PlattformAnzahlPosts}
WHERE EXTRACT(date from time) > "$Zeitraum" AND  profileId = $profileID
GROUP BY tag
ORDER BY tag ASC),
not_exisiting_days AS(
   SELECT all_days.tag as tag, 0 as anzahlPosts
  FROM all_days
  LEFT JOIN existing_days ON all_days.tag = existing_days.tag
  WHERE existing_days.tag IS NULL
)
SELECT * FROM existing_days UNION ALL SELECT * FROM not_exisiting_days
ORDER by tag),

selected_comparison_platform AS(
WITH all_days AS(
  SELECT tag FROM UNNEST(['Sunday', 'Monday', 'Tuesday', 'Wednesday', 'Thursday', 'Friday', 'Saturday']) AS tag
),
existing_days AS(
SELECT getDayByDate(EXTRACT(DATE from time)) as tag, COUNT(DISTINCT externalId) as anzahlPosts FROM ${VergleichsPlattformAnzahlPosts}
WHERE EXTRACT(date from time) > "$Zeitraum" AND profileId = $VergleichsprofileID
GROUP BY tag
ORDER BY tag ASC),
not_exisiting_days AS(
   SELECT all_days.tag as tag, 0 as anzahlPosts
  FROM all_days
  LEFT JOIN existing_days ON all_days.tag = existing_days.tag
  WHERE existing_days.tag IS NULL
)
SELECT * FROM existing_days UNION ALL SELECT * FROM not_exisiting_days
ORDER by tag)

SELECT getDayInGerman(selected_platform.tag) as tag, anzahlPosts,COALESCE(VergleichsAnzahlposts,0)  as VergleichsAnzahlPosts,
"${Vergleichsplattform}" as Vergleichsplatform, "${Plattform}" as platform FROM selected_platform
LEFT JOIN (SELECT tag, anzahlPosts as VergleichsAnzahlPosts FROM selected_comparison_platform) AS selected_comparison_platform
ON selected_platform.tag = selected_comparison_platform.tag
ORDER BY getDayAsNumber(selected_comparison_platform.tag)

CREATE TEMP FUNCTION getDayByDate(datum DATE)
RETURNS STRING
DETERMINISTIC 
LANGUAGE js
AS r"""
var jsDatum = new Date(datum);
var day = jsDatum.getUTCDay();
var days = ['Sunday', 'Monday', 'Tuesday', 'Wednesday', 'Thursday', 'Friday', 'Saturday'];
return days[day];
""";

CREATE TEMP FUNCTION getDayAsNumber(tag STRING)
RETURNS INT64
DETERMINISTIC 
LANGUAGE js
AS r"""
var days = ['Monday', 'Tuesday', 'Wednesday', 'Thursday', 'Friday', 'Saturday', 'Sunday'];
return days.indexOf(tag)
""";

CREATE TEMP FUNCTION getDayInGerman(tag STRING)
RETURNS STRING
DETERMINISTIC 
LANGUAGE js
AS r"""
const dayMap = {
        'Sunday': 'Sonntag',
        'Monday': 'Montag',
        'Tuesday': 'Dienstag',
        'Wednesday': 'Mittwoch',
        'Thursday': 'Donnerstag',
        'Friday': 'Freitag',
        'Saturday': 'Samstag'};
return dayMap[tag]
""";

WITH selected_platform AS(
WITH all_days AS(
  SELECT tag FROM UNNEST(['Sunday', 'Monday', 'Tuesday', 'Wednesday', 'Thursday', 'Friday', 'Saturday']) AS tag
),
existing_days AS(
SELECT getDayByDate(EXTRACT(DATE from time)) as tag, $PlattformInteraktionen as Interaktionen FROM Quintly.${Vorhersagemodel}
WHERE EXTRACT(date from time) > "$Zeitraum" AND  profileId = $profileID
GROUP BY tag
ORDER BY tag ASC),
not_exisiting_days AS(
   SELECT all_days.tag as tag, 0 as Interaktionen
  FROM all_days
  LEFT JOIN existing_days ON all_days.tag = existing_days.tag
  WHERE existing_days.tag IS NULL
)
SELECT * FROM existing_days UNION ALL SELECT * FROM not_exisiting_days
ORDER by tag),

selected_comparison_platform AS(
WITH all_days AS(
  SELECT tag FROM UNNEST(['Sunday', 'Monday', 'Tuesday', 'Wednesday', 'Thursday', 'Friday', 'Saturday']) AS tag
),
existing_days AS(
SELECT getDayByDate(EXTRACT(DATE from time)) as tag, $VergleicsplattformInteraktionen as Interaktionen FROM Quintly.${Vorhersagevergleichsplattform}
WHERE EXTRACT(date from time) > "$Zeitraum" AND profileId = $VergleichsprofileID
GROUP BY tag
ORDER BY tag ASC),
not_exisiting_days AS(
   SELECT all_days.tag as tag, 0 as Interaktionen
  FROM all_days
  LEFT JOIN existing_days ON all_days.tag = existing_days.tag
  WHERE existing_days.tag IS NULL
)
SELECT * FROM existing_days UNION ALL SELECT * FROM not_exisiting_days
ORDER by tag)


SELECT getDayInGerman(selected_platform.tag) as tag, Interaktionen,COALESCE(VergleichsInteraktionen,0)  as VergleichsInteraktionen,
"${Vergleichsplattform}" as Vergleichsplatform, "${Plattform}" as platform FROM selected_platform
LEFT JOIN (SELECT tag, Interaktionen as VergleichsInteraktionen FROM selected_comparison_platform) AS selected_comparison_platform
ON selected_platform.tag = selected_comparison_platform.tag
ORDER BY getDayAsNumber(selected_comparison_platform.tag)

CREATE TEMP FUNCTION getDayByDate(datum DATE)
RETURNS STRING
DETERMINISTIC
LANGUAGE js
AS r"""
var jsDatum = new Date(datum);
var day = jsDatum.getUTCDay();
var days = ['Sunday', 'Monday', 'Tuesday', 'Wednesday', 'Thursday', 'Friday', 'Saturday'];
return days[day];
""";

CREATE TEMP FUNCTION getDayAsNumber(tag STRING)
RETURNS INT64
DETERMINISTIC 
LANGUAGE js
AS r"""
var days = ['Monday', 'Tuesday', 'Wednesday', 'Thursday', 'Friday', 'Saturday', 'Sunday'];
return days.indexOf(tag)
""";

CREATE TEMP FUNCTION getDayInGerman(tag STRING)
RETURNS STRING
DETERMINISTIC 
LANGUAGE js
AS r"""
const dayMap = {
        'Sunday': 'Sonntag',
        'Monday': 'Montag',
        'Tuesday': 'Dienstag',
        'Wednesday': 'Mittwoch',
        'Thursday': 'Donnerstag',
        'Friday': 'Freitag',
        'Saturday': 'Samstag'};
return dayMap[tag]
""";

WITH selected_platform AS(
WITH all_days AS(
  SELECT tag FROM UNNEST(['Sunday', 'Monday', 'Tuesday', 'Wednesday', 'Thursday', 'Friday', 'Saturday']) AS tag
),
existing_days AS(
SELECT getDayByDate(EXTRACT(DATE from time)) as tag, ROUND($PlattformInteraktionen/$NumberOfWeeks) as Interaktionen FROM Quintly.${Vorhersagemodel}
WHERE EXTRACT(date from time) > "$Zeitraum" AND  profileId = $profileID
GROUP BY tag
ORDER BY tag ASC),
not_exisiting_days AS(
   SELECT all_days.tag as tag, 0 as Interaktionen
  FROM all_days
  LEFT JOIN existing_days ON all_days.tag = existing_days.tag
  WHERE existing_days.tag IS NULL
)
SELECT * FROM existing_days UNION ALL SELECT * FROM not_exisiting_days
ORDER by tag)
SELECT getDayInGerman(selected_platform.tag) as tag, Interaktionen FROM selected_platform
ORDER BY getDayAsNumber(selected_platform.tag) ASC

CREATE TEMP FUNCTION getDayByDate(datum DATE)
RETURNS STRING
DETERMINISTIC
LANGUAGE js
AS r"""
var jsDatum = new Date(datum);
var day = jsDatum.getUTCDay();
var days = ['Sunday', 'Monday', 'Tuesday', 'Wednesday', 'Thursday', 'Friday', 'Saturday'];
return days[day];
""";

CREATE TEMP FUNCTION getDayAsNumber(tag STRING)
RETURNS INT64
DETERMINISTIC 
LANGUAGE js
AS r"""
var days = ['Monday', 'Tuesday', 'Wednesday', 'Thursday', 'Friday', 'Saturday', 'Sunday'];
return days.indexOf(tag)
""";

CREATE TEMP FUNCTION getDayInGerman(tag STRING)
RETURNS STRING
DETERMINISTIC 
LANGUAGE js
AS r"""
const dayMap = {
        'Sunday': 'Sonntag',
        'Monday': 'Montag',
        'Tuesday': 'Dienstag',
        'Wednesday': 'Mittwoch',
        'Thursday': 'Donnerstag',
        'Friday': 'Freitag',
        'Saturday': 'Samstag'};
return dayMap[tag]
""";

WITH selected_platform AS(
WITH all_days AS(
  SELECT tag FROM UNNEST(['Sunday', 'Monday', 'Tuesday', 'Wednesday', 'Thursday', 'Friday', 'Saturday']) AS tag
),
existing_days AS(
SELECT getDayByDate(EXTRACT(DATE from time)) as tag, ROUND($VergleicsplattformInteraktionen/$NumberOfWeeks) as Interaktionen FROM Quintly.${Vorhersagevergleichsplattform}
WHERE EXTRACT(date from time) > "$Zeitraum" AND  profileId = $VergleichsprofileID
GROUP BY tag
ORDER BY tag ASC),
not_exisiting_days AS(
   SELECT all_days.tag as tag, 
   CASE "${Vergleichsplattform}"
   WHEN "" THEN CAST(NULL as INT64)
   ELSE 0 END as Interaktionen
  FROM all_days
  LEFT JOIN existing_days ON all_days.tag = existing_days.tag
  WHERE existing_days.tag IS NULL
)
SELECT * FROM existing_days UNION ALL SELECT * FROM not_exisiting_days
ORDER by tag)
SELECT getDayInGerman(selected_platform.tag) as tag, Interaktionen FROM selected_platform
ORDER BY getDayAsNumber(selected_platform.tag) ASC

SELECT * FROM
(SELECT DATE(forecast_timestamp) as Datum, forecast_value as Vorhersage, prediction_interval_lower_bound as Unterschranke
, prediction_interval_upper_bound as Oberschranke  FROM ML.FORECAST(MODEL `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Quintly.arimaModel_${Vorhersagemodel}_${profileID}`,STRUCT($Vorhersagezeitraum AS horizon),
(  SELECT
      EXTRACT(DATE from time) as datum, * EXCEPT(`time`)
    FROM (
    SELECT * EXCEPT($PlattformFollowersVorhersageExceptList) FROM `Quintly.${Vorhersagemodel}`
     WHERE EXTRACT(date from time) < "$heute"
    AND profileId = $profileID
)))) AS predicted_data
LEFT JOIN (SELECT DATE_ADD(EXTRACT(date from time), INTERVAL $Vorhersagezeitraum DAY) as Datum, $PlattformFollowersField as page_follows, EXTRACT(date from time) as EchtesDatum
FROM `Quintly.${Vorhersagemodel}` 
WHERE EXTRACT(date from time) > "$Zeitraum" AND profileId = $profileID AND $PlattformFollowersField IS NOT NULL
ORDER BY datum DESC) AS real_data
ON real_data.datum = predicted_data.datum

WITH available_vergleichsplattform AS (
SELECT predicted_data.Datum, Vorhersage, Unterschranke, Oberschranke, page_follows, EchtesDatum FROM
(SELECT DATE(forecast_timestamp) as Datum, forecast_value as Vorhersage, prediction_interval_lower_bound as Unterschranke
, prediction_interval_upper_bound as Oberschranke  FROM ML.FORECAST(MODEL `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Quintly.arimaModel_${Vorhersagevergleichsplattform}_${VorhersageVergleichsprofileID}`,STRUCT($Vorhersagezeitraum AS horizon),
(  SELECT
      EXTRACT(DATE from time) as datum, * EXCEPT(`time`)
    FROM (
    SELECT * EXCEPT($VergleichsPlattformFollowersVorhersageExceptList) FROM `Quintly.${Vorhersagevergleichsplattform}`
     WHERE EXTRACT(date from time) < "$heute"
    AND profileId = $VorhersageVergleichsprofileID
)))) AS predicted_data
LEFT JOIN (SELECT DATE_ADD(EXTRACT(date from time), INTERVAL $Vorhersagezeitraum DAY) as Datum, $VergleichsPlattformFollowersField as page_follows, EXTRACT(date from time) as EchtesDatum
FROM `Quintly.${Vorhersagevergleichsplattform}` 
WHERE EXTRACT(date from time) > "$VorhersageVergleichsPlattformZeitraum" AND profileId = $VorhersageVergleichsprofileID AND $VergleichsPlattformFollowersField IS NOT NULL
ORDER BY datum DESC) AS real_data
ON real_data.datum = predicted_data.datum),
none_data AS(
   SELECT 
    CAST(NULL AS DATE) AS Datum,
    CAST(NULL AS FLOAT64) AS Vorhersage,
    CAST(NULL AS FLOAT64) AS Unterschranke,
    CAST(NULL AS FLOAT64) AS Oberschranke,
    CAST(NULL AS INT64) AS page_follows,
    CAST(NULL AS DATE) AS EchtesDatum
)
SELECT
CASE 
    WHEN "${Vergleichsplattform}" = "" THEN nd.Datum
    ELSE av.Datum
END AS Datum,
CASE 
    WHEN "${Vergleichsplattform}" = "" THEN nd.Vorhersage
    ELSE av.Vorhersage
END AS Vorhersage,
CASE 
    WHEN "${Vergleichsplattform}" = "" THEN nd.Unterschranke
    ELSE av.Unterschranke
END AS Unterschranke,
CASE 
    WHEN "${Vergleichsplattform}" = "" THEN nd.Oberschranke
    ELSE av.Oberschranke
END AS Oberschranke,
CASE 
    WHEN "${Vergleichsplattform}" = "" THEN nd.page_follows
    ELSE av.page_follows
END AS page_follows,
CASE 
    WHEN "${Vergleichsplattform}" = "" THEN nd.EchtesDatum
    ELSE av.EchtesDatum
END AS EchtesDatum,
FROM available_vergleichsplattform av, none_data nd

query.rawSql:
Select a.LRA  FROM
(
SELECT DISTINCT LRA FROM `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Quintly.profiles` 
) as a 
ORDER BY(
CASE WHEN a.LRA like  LEFT("${__user.login}",3)
THEN 1
ELSE 0
END
) DESC

SELECT a.profile 
FROM 
(SELECT profile FROM `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Quintly.profiles` WHERE LRA = '$LRA' AND facebookId != 0) as a,
(SELECT  Profil_FB FROM `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Quintly.default-settings` WHERE LRA = '$LRA') as b
ORDER BY( 
CASE WHEN a.profile = b.Profil_FB THEN 1
ELSE 2
END
), UPPER(a.profile) ASC

current.text: TT: Es kann nur Eine/n geben! Welches Team seid ihr? #Weihnachtsmann #Christkind #Nikolaus #Knechtruprecht #Postbote #extra3 #Satire

query.rawSql:
WITH plattform_prefix AS(
  SELECT CASE "${Plattform}"
  WHEN "Facebook" THEN "FB"
  WHEN "Instagram" THEN "IG"
  WHEN "Youtube" THEN "YT"
  WHEN "TikTok" THEN "TT" END AS prefix
), plattform_max_not_null_date AS(
SELECT DATE_SUB(max(EXTRACT(DATE from time)), INTERVAL 7 DAY) as datum FROM `Quintly.${Vorhersagemodel}`
  WHERE $PlattformFollowersField IS NOT NULL AND profileId = $profileID
), plattform_posts AS(
  SELECT CONCAT(prefix,": ", $PlattformPostField) FROM ${PlattformAnzahlPosts}, plattform_prefix, plattform_max_not_null_date WHERE
  EXTRACT(date from time) > plattform_max_not_null_date.datum AND  profileId = $profileID
), vergleichsplattform_max_not_null_date AS(
  SELECT DATE_SUB(max(EXTRACT(DATE from time)), INTERVAL 7 DAY) as datum FROM `Quintly.${Vorhersagevergleichsplattform}`
  WHERE $VergleichsPlattformFollowersField IS NOT NULL AND profileId = $VorhersageVergleichsprofileID 
), vergleichsplattform_prefix AS(
  SELECT CASE "${Vergleichsplattform}"
  WHEN "Facebook" THEN "FB"
  WHEN "Instagram" THEN "IG"
  WHEN "Youtube" THEN "YT"
  WHEN "TikTok" THEN "TT" END AS prefix
), vergleichsplattform_posts AS(
  SELECT CONCAT(prefix,": ", $VergleichsplattformPostField) FROM ${VergleichsPlattformAnzahlPosts}, vergleichsplattform_prefix, vergleichsplattform_max_not_null_date WHERE
  EXTRACT(date from time) > vergleichsplattform_max_not_null_date.datum AND  profileId = $VergleichsprofileID
)
SELECT * FROM plattform_posts UNION ALL SELECT * FROM vergleichsplattform_posts

query.rawSql: SELECT CURRENT_DATE("Europe/Berlin")

WITH instagram AS(
  SELECT "Instagram" as platform FROM Quintly.profiles
  WHERE instagramId = $InprofileID AND instagramId > 0
),
facebook AS (
SELECT "Facebook" as platform FROM Quintly.profiles
  WHERE facebookId = $FBprofileID AND facebookId > 0
),
youtube AS (
SELECT "Youtube" as platform FROM Quintly.profiles
  WHERE youtubeId = $YTprofileID AND youtubeId > 0
),
tiktok AS (
SELECT "TikTok" as platform FROM Quintly.profiles
  WHERE tiktokId = $TTprofileID AND tiktokId > 0
)
SELECT platform FROM facebook UNION ALL SELECT platform FROM instagram
UNION ALL SELECT platform FROM youtube UNION ALL SELECT platform FROM tiktok

WITH instagram AS(
  SELECT "Instagram" as platform FROM Quintly.profiles
  WHERE instagramId = $InprofileID AND instagramId > 0
),
facebook AS (
SELECT "Facebook" as platform FROM Quintly.profiles
  WHERE facebookId = $FBprofileID AND facebookId > 0
),
youtube AS (
SELECT "Youtube" as platform FROM Quintly.profiles
  WHERE youtubeId = $YTprofileID AND youtubeId > 0
),
tiktok AS (
SELECT "TikTok" as platform FROM Quintly.profiles
  WHERE tiktokId = $TTprofileID AND tiktokId > 0
),
all_platforms AS(
SELECT platform FROM facebook UNION ALL SELECT platform FROM instagram
UNION ALL SELECT platform FROM youtube UNION ALL SELECT platform FROM tiktok)
SELECT platform FROM all_platforms
WHERE platform != "$Plattform"
SELECT facebookID FROM `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Quintly.profiles` WHERE profile = '''$Profil'''
SELECT instagramID FROM `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Quintly.profiles` WHERE profile = '''$Profil'''
SELECT youtubeID FROM `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Quintly.profiles` WHERE profile = '''$Profil'''
SELECT tiktokID FROM `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Quintly.profiles` WHERE profile = '''$Profil'''

SELECT CASE "$Plattform"
WHEN "Facebook" THEN facebookID 
WHEN "Instagram" THEN instagramID
WHEN "Youtube" THEN youtubeID
WHEN "TikTok" THEN tiktokID END
FROM `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Quintly.profiles` WHERE profile = '''$Profil'''

SELECT CASE "$Vergleichsplattform"
WHEN "Facebook" THEN facebookID 
WHEN "Instagram" THEN instagramID
WHEN "Youtube" THEN youtubeID
WHEN "TikTok" THEN tiktokID 
ELSE 0 END
FROM `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Quintly.profiles` WHERE profile = '''$Profil'''

SELECT CASE "$Plattform"
WHEN "Facebook" THEN "facebookInsights"
WHEN "Instagram" THEN "instagram"
WHEN "TikTok" THEN "tiktokAnalytics" 
WHEN "Youtube" THEN "youtubeAnalytics" END

SELECT CASE "$Vergleichsplattform"
WHEN "Facebook" THEN "facebookInsights"
WHEN "Instagram" THEN "instagram"
WHEN "TikTok" THEN "tiktokAnalytics" 
WHEN "Youtube" THEN "youtubeAnalytics"
ELSE "${Vorhersagemodel}" END

SELECT CASE "${Plattform}"
WHEN "Facebook" THEN $FBExcept
WHEN "Instagram" THEN $InExcept
WHEN "Youtube" THEN $YTExcept
WHEN "TikTok" THEN $TTExcept END

query.rawSql:
SELECT CASE "${Vergleichsplattform}"
WHEN "Facebook" THEN $FBExcept
WHEN "Instagram" THEN $InExcept
WHEN "Youtube" THEN $YTExcept
WHEN "TikTok" THEN $TTExcept
ELSE "$PlattformFollowersVorhersageExceptList" END

SELECT CASE "${Plattform}"
WHEN "Facebook" THEN "page_follows"
WHEN "Instagram" THEN "followers"
WHEN "Youtube" THEN "subscriberslifetime"
WHEN "TikTok" THEN "followers" END

SELECT CASE "${Vergleichsplattform}"
WHEN "Facebook" THEN "page_follows"
WHEN "Instagram" THEN "followers"
WHEN "Youtube" THEN "subscriberslifetime"
WHEN "TikTok" THEN "followers" 
ELSE "$PlattformFollowersField" END

WITH max_not_null_date AS(
  SELECT max(EXTRACT(DATE from time)) as datum FROM `Quintly.${Vorhersagemodel}`
  WHERE $PlattformFollowersField IS NOT NULL AND profileId = $profileID 
)

SELECT CASE $Vorhersagezeitraum
WHEN 7 THEN DATE_SUB(datum, INTERVAL 7 DAY)
WHEN 14 THEN DATE_SUB(datum, INTERVAL 14 DAY)
WHEN 21 THEN DATE_SUB(datum, INTERVAL 21 DAY)
WHEN 30 THEN DATE_SUB(datum, INTERVAL 30 DAY)
WHEN 60 THEN DATE_SUB(datum, INTERVAL 60 DAY) END
FROM max_not_null_date

WITH max_not_null_date AS(
  SELECT max(EXTRACT(DATE from time)) as datum FROM `Quintly.${Vorhersagevergleichsplattform}`
  WHERE $VergleichsPlattformFollowersField IS NOT NULL AND profileId = $VergleichsprofileID 
)

SELECT CASE $Vorhersagezeitraum
WHEN 7 THEN DATE_SUB(datum, INTERVAL 7 DAY)
WHEN 14 THEN DATE_SUB(datum, INTERVAL 14 DAY)
WHEN 21 THEN DATE_SUB(datum, INTERVAL 21 DAY)
WHEN 30 THEN DATE_SUB(datum, INTERVAL 30 DAY)
WHEN 60 THEN DATE_SUB(datum, INTERVAL 60 DAY) END
FROM max_not_null_date

SELECT
   CASE "${Plattform}"
   WHEN "Facebook" THEN "Quintly.facebookInsightsOwnPosts"
   WHEN "Instagram" THEN "Quintly.instagramInsightsOwnPosts"
   WHEN "Youtube" THEN "Quintly.youtubeAnalyticsVideos"
   WHEN "TikTok" THEN "Quintly.tiktokAnalyticsOwnPosts" END

SELECT
   CASE "${Vergleichsplattform}"
   WHEN "Facebook" THEN "Quintly.facebookInsightsOwnPosts"
   WHEN "Instagram" THEN "Quintly.instagramInsightsOwnPosts"
   WHEN "Youtube" THEN "Quintly.youtubeAnalyticsVideos"
   WHEN "TikTok" THEN "Quintly.tiktokAnalyticsOwnPosts"
   ELSE "$PlattformAnzahlPosts" END

SELECT CASE "$Vergleichsplattform"
WHEN "Facebook" THEN facebookID 
WHEN "Instagram" THEN instagramID
WHEN "Youtube" THEN youtubeID
WHEN "TikTok" THEN tiktokID 
ELSE $profileID END
FROM `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Quintly.profiles` WHERE profile = '''$Profil'''

WITH max_not_null_date AS(
  SELECT max(EXTRACT(DATE from time)) as datum FROM `Quintly.${Vorhersagevergleichsplattform}`
  WHERE $VergleichsPlattformFollowersField IS NOT NULL AND profileId = $VorhersageVergleichsprofileID 
)

SELECT CASE $Vorhersagezeitraum
WHEN 7 THEN DATE_SUB(datum, INTERVAL 7 DAY)
WHEN 14 THEN DATE_SUB(datum, INTERVAL 14 DAY)
WHEN 21 THEN DATE_SUB(datum, INTERVAL 21 DAY)
WHEN 30 THEN DATE_SUB(datum, INTERVAL 30 DAY)
WHEN 60 THEN DATE_SUB(datum, INTERVAL 60 DAY) END
FROM max_not_null_date

current.text: SUM(IFNULL(page_actions_post_reactions_total_like + page_actions_post_reactions_total_love + page_actions_post_reactions_total_wow + page_actions_post_reactions_total_haha + page_actions_post_reactions_total_sorry + page_actions_post_reactions_total_anger + page_positive_feedback_by_type_comment + page_positive_feedback_by_type_link,0))
current.value: SUM(IFNULL(page_actions_post_reactions_total_like + page_actions_post_reactions_total_love + page_actions_post_reactions_total_wow + page_actions_post_reactions_total_haha + page_actions_post_reactions_total_sorry + page_actions_post_reactions_total_anger + page_positive_feedback_by_type_comment + page_positive_feedback_by_type_link,0))

query.rawSql:
SELECT CASE "${Plattform}"
WHEN "Facebook" THEN "SUM(IFNULL(page_actions_post_reactions_total_like + page_actions_post_reactions_total_love + page_actions_post_reactions_total_wow + page_actions_post_reactions_total_haha + page_actions_post_reactions_total_sorry + page_actions_post_reactions_total_anger + page_positive_feedback_by_type_comment + page_positive_feedback_by_type_link,0))"
WHEN "Instagram" THEN "SUM(IFNULL(imagesLikes + imagesComments + videosLikes + videosComments + carouselsLikes + carouselsComments + reelsLikes + reelsComments,0))"
WHEN "Youtube" THEN "IFNULL(SUM(likes + dislikes + comments + shares),0)"
WHEN "TikTok" THEN "SUM(ownVideosViews)" END
--ELSE "1" END

current.text: SUM(IFNULL(imagesLikes + imagesComments + videosLikes + videosComments + carouselsLikes + carouselsComments + reelsLikes + reelsComments,0))
current.value: SUM(IFNULL(imagesLikes + imagesComments + videosLikes + videosComments + carouselsLikes + carouselsComments + reelsLikes + reelsComments,0))

query.rawSql:
SELECT CASE "${Vergleichsplattform}"
WHEN "Facebook" THEN "SUM(IFNULL(page_actions_post_reactions_total_like + page_actions_post_reactions_total_love + page_actions_post_reactions_total_wow + page_actions_post_reactions_total_haha + page_actions_post_reactions_total_sorry + page_actions_post_reactions_total_anger + page_positive_feedback_by_type_comment + page_positive_feedback_by_type_link,0))"
WHEN "Instagram" THEN "SUM(IFNULL(imagesLikes + imagesComments + videosLikes + videosComments + carouselsLikes + carouselsComments + reelsLikes + reelsComments,0))"
WHEN "Youtube" THEN "IFNULL(SUM(likes + dislikes + comments + shares),0)"
WHEN "TikTok" THEN "SUM(ownVideosViews)"
ELSE "CAST(NULL AS INT64)" END

SELECT CASE "${Vorhersagezeitraum}"
WHEN "Eine Woche" THEN 1
WHEN "Zwei Wochen" THEN 2
WHEN "Drei Wochen" THEN 3
WHEN "Ein Monat" THEN 30/7
ELSE 60/7 END

SELECT CASE "${Plattform}"
  WHEN "Facebook" THEN "message"
  WHEN "Instagram" THEN "message"
  WHEN "Youtube" THEN "title"
  WHEN "TikTok" THEN "description" END

SELECT CASE "${Vergleichsplattform}"
  WHEN "Facebook" THEN "message"
  WHEN "Instagram" THEN "message"
  WHEN "Youtube" THEN "title"
  WHEN "TikTok" THEN "description" END
